## Experimental.RangeOf.includes() method

Determines if a supplied value is within this range.

**Signature:**

```typescript
includes(t: T): boolean;
```

</th><th>

The value to be tested.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

boolean

Returns `true` if `t` falls within the range, `false` otherwise.
